data.name: Frenki
data.field: Bot & AI Developer | Web & Blockchain Developer | Digital Automation
data.about_me:
I am a technology developer specializing in smart bots, business AI, digital automation, and web & blockchain development. With expertise in Telegram bots, web scraping, AI systems, and Web3 & DApp development, I help businesses and individuals leverage advanced technology to improve operational efficiency.

In addition to developing bot and AI-based solutions, I also have experience in building modern websites, Web3-based applications, and Decentralized Applications (DApps) that integrate blockchain technology.
core_skills: Telegram Bots & AI Chatbots – Enhancing customer service with intelligent and responsive bots.
Web Scraping & Automation – Utilizing Selenium & Python to extract real-time data from various sources.
Trading Bots & Data Analytics – Developing trading analysis bots that gather data from 10+ websites automatically.
Google Sheets & Business Automation – Creating automated cloud-based financial and business management systems.
Website Development – Building modern, responsive, and functional websites using various technologies.
Blockchain & Web3 Development – Developing DApps, smart contracts, and Web3-based applications with blockchain integration.
VPS & Linux Management – Running server-based applications with optimal performance.
data.freelance_info: I am also active on Fiverr, offering Telegram bot, trading bot, website development, and blockchain solutions for global clients with unlimited revisions & a 1-year warranty.
data.contact_note: I am open to collaboration and technology-based projects. If you're interested, feel free to contact me!
